name: MMO Raid Healer Simulator
description:
The simulation experience of what it's like to be a healer in an MMO Raid!

Abilities

"Cure": Simple, spammable heal
"Healing Aura": Simple, spammable, AoE heal
"Herbal Infusion": Charge for a few seconds then heal large heal
"Innervate": Channelled over-time heal
"Shrooooooms!": Charge for a few seconds and heal your entire team.
"Revive": Single-target revive.

Your allies will use a combination of channelled and charged abilities to deal damage to the boss.

The Kraken

The Kraken uses a single-target ability on-cooldown, with every 3-4 attacks being an AoE ability that deals damage to everyone on your team.
